Hi Ricardo,

Ricardo J. Mï¿½ndez wrote:

>Hi,
>
>I've just begun experimenting with sharpNeat.  I'm adding my own
>experiments, documenting the process a bit, and in the meantime have
>run into a couple of small things which I believe are bugs. What's the
>proper procedure for contributing to the project?
>  
>
For now you can email me direct on my cgreen or sharpneat address, it 
doesn't matter which. Alternatively I've created a new mailing list 
called sharpneat-developers which should appear on the sourceforge 
project page within the next 6-24 hours (according to sourceforge help 
docs) - don't subscribe to the existing announcement list though as I've 
flagged it for deletion.

Regarding your other (private) email I take it you're making some 
progress in understanding how to plug in new experiments? There aren't 
any existing docs right now and I don't plan to write any as I'm 
planning to do some more significant re-structuring. That said it 
wouldn't take long to go over the basics if you still need some help.

Welcome to the group,

Colin.
